/usr/bin/cc   -rdynamic CMakeFiles/glfwinfo.dir/glfwinfo.c.o CMakeFiles/glfwinfo.dir/__/deps/getopt.c.o CMakeFiles/glfwinfo.dir/__/deps/glad_gl.c.o CMakeFiles/glfwinfo.dir/__/deps/glad_vulkan.c.o  -o glfwinfo  -Wl,-rpath,/home/irifulmin/Documents/personalDocuments/programming/3D-Collaborative-Game/glfw-master/glfw-build/src ../src/libglfw.so.3.4 -lm
